attributes.action: Remove compromised Pro-Israel MP Priti Patel from her role as Int. Dev Secretary
attributes.additional_details: Priti Patel held undisclosed meetings in Israel - http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-41853561
attributes.background:
MP Priti Patel made unrecorded visits to key Israel figures, while insistent on cutting Palestinian aid.
The meeting compromises the UKs position as a mediator in the region and aligns the government with an Israeli apartheid regime. Her position as a key International rep for the UK is untenable.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked.
